channel.title: Compilation of Presidential Documents - New items on govinfo
channel.description: Provides access to newly published GovInfo content from the Compilation of Presidential Documents. The Compilation of Presidential Documents collection consists of the official publications of materials released by the White House Press Secretary. The Compilation of Presidential Documents is published by the Office of the Federal Register (OFR), National Archives and Records Administration (NARA)."

image.title: Compilation of Presidential Documents - New items on govinfo

channel.copyright: Title 17, Section 105, United States Code, provides that: Copyright protection under this title is not available for any work of the United States Government, but the United States Government is not precluded from receiving and holding copyrights transferred to it by assignment, bequest, or otherwise. For more information, see https://www.govinfo.gov/about/policies#copyright
